statement.p: In 27.59 of the last 29 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{29}}={0.2759}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{29}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2759}\cdot{29}={8.0011}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 29-8.0011=20.9989 We round that as requested to 21.
